['Reduced  Midnight Pulse cast point from 0.3 to 0.2.', ' Black Hole

Now deals 55/110/165 damage per second within its entire (400) radius.

[' Malefice no longer ignores its cast backswing.', 'Increased  Midnight Pulse max health as damage per second from 3%/4%/5%/6% to 4%/5%/6%/7%.', "Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Enigma: Adds damage to  Black Hole equal to  Midnight Pulse's damage based on its level. Stacks with a regular cast Midnight Pulse."]

['Reduced  Malefice damage per tick from 30/40/65/80 to 40/40/65/65 (total damage 30/80/130/240 to 40/80/130/195).', 'Increased  Midnight Pulse cast range from 500 to 700.', ' Black Hole\nNow affects  Primal Split spirits.\nIncreased mana cost from 200/300/400 to 250/350/450.', 'Now affects  Primal Split spirits.', 'Increased mana cost from 200/300/400 to 250/350/450.']

["Fixed affected units sometimes being able to use items during  Black Hole depending on the affected heroes' entry vector."]
['Fixed  Malefice stop working when the target gets out of vision.']
["Changed Enigma's alliance from Sentinel to Scourge ( Radiant to  Dire).", " Malefice is now properly blocked by  Linken's Sphere.", ' Black Hole now has an area targeting cursor.']

['Can now be cast on any non-hero, non-ancient unit, instead of only allied once (cannot target units above level 5).', 'Eidolons now multiply when having attacked 6 times (each can only multiply once, Eidolons created from multiplying cannot).', "Increased Eidolons' magic resistance from 33% to 50%.", 'Fixed acquisition range and collision size of Eidolons.', 'Changed model and model scale.', 'Increased duration from 30 to 35.', 'Increased cooldown from 15 to 35.', 'Increased mana cost from 125 to 170.', " Demonic Conversion
Can now be cast on any non-hero, non-ancient unit, instead of only allied once (cannot target units above level 5).
Eidolons now multiply when having attacked 6 times (each can only multiply once, Eidolons created from multiplying cannot).
Increased Eidolons' magic resistance from 33% to 50%.
Fixed acquisition range and collision size of Eidolons.
Changed model and model scale.
Increased duration from 30 to 35.
Increased cooldown from 15 to 35.
Increased mana cost from 125 to 170.", ' Black Hole
Fixed not properly silencing spell immune enemies.
Now provides 800 range ground vision for 4 seconds at its center.', 'Fixed not properly silencing spell immune enemies.', 'Now provides 800 range ground vision for 4 seconds at its center.']

['Reduced base  strength from 17 to 16.', ' Demonic Conversion
No longer works on couriers.
Now instantly spawns the Eidolons, instead of after ~0.3 seconds.
